CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper January 24, 1953, pg. 30, reads: "Celebration of YMCA Week Starts This Saturday - Would-Be Champs - From early afternoon until late at night, those who think they are good busy themselves at checkers at our 'Y.' The gentleman in the corner in the checkered vest is what you would call a 'checkered champ.' Last year's champ was Henry Adams Sr. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Two men playing checkers with another looking on in Centre Avenue YMCA
